analysis: Market analysis indicates balanced conditions with no clear directional bias. RSI at 23.85 signals oversold conditions, potential reversal opportunity. Money Flow Index at 15.11 shows extreme selling pressure. MACD showing trend transition, awaiting confirmation. Price below Bollinger middle band, downside pressure present. Technical structure favors downside with price below key support levels. Ichimoku structure confirms bearish environment. Stochastic at 87.28 warns of overbought exhaustion.

indicator_insights.macd: Early bullish crossover below zero. Recovery phase initiated, watch for confirmation.

indicator_insights.moving_average: Price 0.31% below MA. Downtrend confirmed, MA acting as dynamic resistance.
